header.title: The world's first and only amulet holder verification system and marketplace for authentic amulets validated by scientific and expert processes.
header.aboutCon:
Siam Amulet Collection It is a system to confirm the holder of Thai amulets and Talisman and is an amulet rental market available through the website. Every amulet and charm in the confirmation system for the owner of the amulet has gone through the process of creating an identity with scientific processes and expert opinions to confirm that the amulets and charm are consistent in terms of both science and Buddhist art. Amulets and sacred objects created in the era that the creator has recorded even though you recorded it yourself and a record that is accepted in Thailand. And only amulets and sacred objects that have been entered into the system to confirm their holders only therefore can be announced for sale in the market for worshiping the amulet in order to cause the exchange of amulets and talisman that can be proven. It means that the tenant who worships will be delivered the amulets and talisman with the identity of the amulets that can be verified that the received amulets and sacred objects are correct and it must be exactly as advertised for rent or not.
Moreover, Siam Amulet Collection amulet rental market is a market where the owner of the amulet is the one who announces the rental of the worship by themself. This is a collection that has been preserved for a long time. Currently, this is a market for renting amulets and sacred objects with a largest number of scientifically verified amulets in Thailand.
